name: Super Ball Jump
description:
Do you love ball games or jumping games?

In this ball game, you have to jump quickly and always be on alert to manage obstacles, like flying spikes, crazy saws, weird creatures and more.

You can select from multiple worlds, where for each the challenges increase dramatically.

Top to ball jump and reach higher distance score. Share your score on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or challenge friends to beat yours. It can really get crazy when you start changing balls to jump with. In the Balls Section, you can unlock around 15 different balls. Each ball have different jumping abilities to reach higher with one tap. You can unlock the balls with in-game currency (diamonds) or grab some with in-app purchases.

It's time to have some fun!
Play now!

Like Super Ball Jump on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Super-Ball-Jump-169976220276284/
